meaning_str.bing:
n. 刮脸；修面；剃须
v. 剃（须发）；（尤指）刮脸；（少量地）削减
网络. 刮胡子；刨；修剪

剃（须发）；（尤指）刮脸；（少量地）削减

剃（须）；修剪（面部毛发）；剃去（毛发）；擦过；紧贴着通过；（少量地）削减（费用或数量）
剃须；修面；刮脸；剃毛；削减；微小差距；险些发生的事情

1.en: Sales managers may be willing to shave a bit more off the price at the end of the month.
1.cn: 销售经理们也许会愿意在月底稍微砍掉一点价格。

2.en: He also says that the team was able to shave a off a bit of the initial startup time by designing a more efficient first run page.
2.cn: 他还说自己所在团队通过设计一个更高效的首次运行页面，节省了一定的初始启动时间。

3.en: Leighton Meester has said that she would shave her head if it was required for a role that she wanted to perform.
3.cn: 莉顿·梅斯特说如果角色需要，她愿意为艺术献身，剃光头都没问题。

0.en: Come on. Now go shave that head. All right.

1.en: I'm up for it as long as they don't shave anything.
1.cn: 只要不用剃毛什么的，我就参加。

2.en: Well, shave me down and call me a mole rat. You found another mammoth.
2.cn: 把我毛剃光，叫我鼹鼠。竟然还有头长毛象!

3.en: You take this one. I spent an hour last night on "How do vampires shave when they can't see themselves in the mirror"?
3.cn: 你听听我的，我昨晚花了一个小时在想，"既然吸血鬼在镜子里都看不见自己，他们是怎么给自己剃胡子的"？

4.en: So, did you shave your legs? Yeah.

5.en: Ready to go driverless? Let's do it. I can now read, shave, yodel.
5.cn: 准备好进入自动驾驶模式了吗？来吧。我现在可以看书，刮胡子，练习约德尔唱腔。

6.en: Well-groomed vampires meet in pairs and shave each other, case closed.
6.cn: 衣冠楚楚的吸血鬼两两搭伴，互相刮胡子，解释完毕。

7.en: Well, you need a shave! If that beard gets any longer, I'll be picking food out of it.
7.cn: 你需要刮胡子了，如果这胡子再长点我就可以从里面挑食物渣了。

8.en: I think I brought back half of the beach in my hair. It was so much easier when I used to shave my head.
8.cn: 我的头发里都是沙子，以前光头方便多了。

9.en: Mon, maybe one of these guys wants to wear your dress. I'm gonna go shave. Yeah well, I'm gonna go spit.
9.cn: 莫妮卡，或许他们之中有人想穿你的礼服。我得去刮胡子。对，我得去吐痰了。

10.en: Mustache is looking good there, Sheldon. Don't thank me. Thank the dice. They told me what percentage of my face to shave.
10.cn: 小胡子不错啊，谢尔顿。别夸我，夸骰子吧，骰子告诉我该刮多少比例的胡子。

11.en: When you are ready for a break, taste one of Kona's exclusive brews or treat the children to shave ice, another Hawaiian specialty.
11.cn: 在休息的时候，品尝科纳独有的酿制啤酒，或给小朋友一杯夏威夷特产刨冰。

12.en: Thank you. Okay, a toothbrush, toothpaste, razor, mouthwash, deodorant, dental floss, Band Aids, shaving cream, after shave. And I feel like I'm forgetting something.
12.cn: 谢谢你 好的，牙刷、牙膏、刮胡刀、漱口水、体香剂、牙线、绷带、刮胡乳液、收敛水。我觉得我好像漏了什么东西。
